title: Pods are failing
description: When a pod is failing it means the container either exited with non-zero status or was terminated by the system. This monitor tracks when more than 10 pods are failing for a given Kubernetes cluster.

definition.message:
More than ten pods are failing in ({{kube_cluster_name.name}} cluster). 
 The threshold of ten pods varies depending on your infrastructure. Change the threshold to suit your needs.
definition.name: [kubernetes] Monitor Kubernetes Failed Pods in Namespaces
